statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT interaction_description FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click'
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY user_id, interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_id FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY interaction_type ASC, interaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, timestamp FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants WHERE assistant_name LIKE 'Alex%';
SELECT assistant_id, assistant_name, created_date FROM virtual_assistants ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants WHERE created_date >= '2021-01-01' AND created_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY assistant_name ASC;
SELECT assistant_name, COUNT(assistant_id) AS total_assistants FROM virtual_assistants GROUP BY assistant_name HAVING COUNT(assistant_id) > 1;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_data FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC, interaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_data FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type='like' AND interaction_data->>'post_id' = '12345';
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, timestamp, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, email, last_login FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'johndoe%' ORDER BY last_login ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123456';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT name, skill_level, hired_date FROM assistants ORDER BY hired_date DESC;
SELECT id, username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, interaction_type, user_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT name, skill_level FROM assistants WHERE hired_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assistant_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM VirtualAssistantUsers;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM VirtualAssistantUsers WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT task_name, task_status, assigned_to_user_id FROM AssistantTasks WHERE task_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, assigned_to_user_id FROM AssistantTasks WHERE task_status = 'completed' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM VirtualAssistantUsers WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM VirtualAssistantUsers WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status FROM AssistantTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp, interaction_duration FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 3 AND interaction_duration > 60;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_type, log_message FROM AssistantLogs WHERE log_type = 'Error' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
